h2_title: Yellow Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: He'll spend the next several attacks floating up above you and dive-bombing in his electrified state, and though each dive-bomb looks the same, the timing is slightly different depending on his motions before attacking:
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He'll spend the next several attacks floating up above you and dive-bombing in his electrified state, and though each dive-bomb looks the same, the timing is slightly different depending on his motions before attacking:
